reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan lightweight and perfect for spring and summer, with a buttery smooth feel and drape. The cardigan fits well and is comfortable, with sleeves that are long enough to cover the butt. They appreciate its warmth, noting it keeps the chill off on overseas flights and works well for Arizona weather. While the material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers describing it as ve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this!
items.body: I love this! It is smooth, light weight and fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Sue Smedley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars lightweight and comfortable, stylish
items.body: Cant go wrong with a basic wardrobe staple like this. I love wearing over a cute dress that's a little revealing or just as a convenient open cardigan. I wear it open and don't try to close it over my chest. Will get in more colors. It's super soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit, good length to cover the bum
items.body: Comfortable, fits true to size. Washes easily and so far seems to not fade. I would buy in more colors, only thing I would add is there are no pockets. Maybe not big to some, but I have to carry let's at work. Read more
items.author: Lori Phebus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these cardigans! wear w everything!
items.body: I have two of these cardigans. In black and navy. The black is a nice true black, the navy is a dark true navy. These are an exact dupe of the Lands End rayon knit cardigan at a fraction of the price. I have a bunch of those too, and the Amazon Essentials is even nicer knit. These cardigans are perfect when you need a little cardigan over a sleeveless dress in the air conditioning. The cardigan is perfect for dressing up or down. Even perfect for loungewear. Heat is the enemy of rayon knit, so if you want it to stay nice and soft and luxurious, wash cold and hang dry. Low heat dryer setting will probably be ok, but i prefer hang dry so the cardigans last and stay nice. Amazon Essentials offers a number of garments in this fabric. I have the Amazon Essentials scoop neck tunic tops in this knit rayon i layer w these cardigans for a cute set. Amazon Essentials also offers a lounge pant in this rayon knit that would make a luxurious lounge/pajama set paired w the tunic and cardigan. Amazon Essentials offer tank dresses in this rayon knit that would be luxurious loungewear combination w these cardigans. i wear a size 18/xl for Target, Walmart, Lands End, LL Bean. Amazon Essentials XL fits the same, perfect fit for me. Read more
items.author: Not4Nothin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: For some reason I thought this was a sweater. My fault did not look at the material used, it is a light weight material. Very nice to wear on cooler days. Read more
items.author: Jackie Smerk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Fits great! Love the fabric. Versatile--dress up or down. Getting another one. Read more
items.author: Terri L. Gillespie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very lightweight
items.body: The fabric was slightly heavier than tee shirt material, I wanted something heavier for the brutality cold winter months. If you are in a more temperate climate, this might do the trick. But it was not what I was looking for. Return was quick and easy. Read more
items.author: SEW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent cardigan that covers bum!
items.body: Amazon Essentials Women's Long-Sleeve Open-Front Cardigan, Black/White, Stripe, Medium (Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend - $20.18) I'm 5'4 and 180lbs. Ordered the Large and the Medium. I liked how the Medium fit more and returned the Large. This is such a nice cardigan. The material is good quality and would be perfect for Spring and Fall. I live in a warmer climate and this is too warm for the majority of the year, but is great in my chilly AC workplace. Read more
items.author: Coco P

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Black, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Charcoal Heather, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Navy, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Black White Horizontal Stripe. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
